title: Apkungen - Da Nao Tian Gong
description:
Original Title: Apkungen - Da Nao Tian Gong (Uproar In Heaven)

Production year: 1965

Release year (Sweden): 1983 (I think..)

Original voices: Chinese

Storyteller (Swedish): Hans Alfredsson

Source: PAL Video (VHS)

Lenght: 1h 47 min

Sound: Yes! (It copied from a videorecorder. Take it for what it is.)

Screen: 4:3




Plot:
Uproar in Heaven is based on the famous novel, Pilgrimage to the West, the amazing adventures of the monk Xuanzang as he travels westward in search of Buddhist sutras. It relates how Sun Wukong borrows the golden cudgel from the Dragon Palace; takes a poor position in Heaven and then is demoted and even gets unfair punishment; and how he is pushed beyond the limit of endurance and makes a big scene in Heaven. Finally Sun returns to the Mountain of Flowers and Fruit, entitling himself a king equal to Heaven.
